about_the_game:
Following the smash hit tileset packs from First Seed Material series this mini pack includes a selection of woods and rural farm tilesets in an autumn setting and useful materials perfect for creating a cute little village with a farmyard in the beautiful autumn woods. Continuing in the tradition of beauty, detail and charm that made FSM work in any type of setting, this pack also contains an additional sample game, manual and guide, complete with mapping tips and tricks!

This mini set will allow you to create new areas with ease, while providing you with the tools to customize and improve your maps. Whether you're a beginner or seasoned veteran, FSM : Autumn Woods and Rural Tiles is a must-have in your RPG Maker resource library!

*** Please note that some of the contents (Autumn Woods assets) in this pack are a redesigned autumn version of Bright Woods assets in FSM: Woods and Cave Tiles ***

FEATURES:

* This pack includes Wood tileset / Rural Farm exterior tileset / Farmhouse interior tileset / Farmhouse exterior tileset
* 32 tile sheets (16 day tiles＋16 night version tiles) to create autumn forest, farmland and farm house
* Exterior tiles include: various nature plants, autumn trees, stump, signs, fallen logs, cliffs, wall vines, bridge stone pillar, monument and much more!
* Interior tiles include: pot, deer bone, ladder, fur vest, various furniture to decorate farm house or cabin and much more!
* Various crops, fruit trees, cart, harvest items to create your own farmland!
* Map helper: 22 character sheets with objects such as various doors and unique entrances, indoor & outdoor fire, water object and much more!
* Sample game (fully localized in English) including project file that can be easily imported and used in your projects as well as various maps to discover and play!
* Manual and guide with tips and tricks for using the material and for mapping!
* For use in RPG Makers, Visual Novel Maker or the engine of your choice!
detailed_description:
Please read before you buy!

Please note that "RPG Maker MZ - FSM : Autumn Woods and Rural Tiles" and "RPG Maker MV - FSM : Autumn Woods and Rural Tiles" are the same pack, only the title "MV" and "MZ" are different. The content in these packs are exactly the same, so if you already have one of these packs, you don't have to purchase the other!

short_description: Fans of FSM material rejoice! A mini-pack of tilesets to create autumn woods and rural settings is here!
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Japanese, Korean, Traditional Chinese, Arabic, Simplified Chinese
